metdata.description: A hierarchical inventory relationship in which the configuration of (parent) component is patched with the configuration of other (child) component. Eg: The configuration of the EnvoyFilter (parent) component is patched with the configuration as received from WASMFilter (child) component.

patch.description: The Workspace component's configuration is updated based on specifications from other components, like AlertManagerDefinition, ensuring alignment with connected systems.
AlertManagerDefiniton component provides specific configuration settings to patch or update the Workspace, enabling seamless integration with the AlertManager system.
LoggingConfiguration component provides specific configuration settings to patch or update the Workspace, enabling seamless integration with the Logging system.
RuleGroupsNamespace component provides specific configuration settings to patch or update the Workspace, enabling seamless integration with the RuleGroupsNamespace system.
